TopicTitle: SarnEx Manned Mission to Ovok & Hale (Picture Heavy)

Articles.Content:
SarnEx Liftoff!

![529EE752ED1A9BA0B201D3047E17A9FC3C33F300](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/448455622244100807/529EE752ED1A9BA0B201D3047E17A9FC3C33F300/)

Dropping boosters

![E5F1C7E0884D5291710B1F4DB6596FC8C0FDCC24](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/448455622247065913/E5F1C7E0884D5291710B1F4DB6596FC8C0FDCC24/)

Transfer to Sarnus

![F93BA94E74B3FB7AAA9B2BA9E6597D80BA9295B3](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/448455622244101384/F93BA94E74B3FB7AAA9B2BA9E6597D80BA9295B3/)

Lining up Ovok Encounter

![1BD33369DD0E224D4E3D6C6FE4198738FF7C79ED](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/448455622250276019/1BD33369DD0E224D4E3D6C6FE4198738FF7C79ED/)

"That's one big egg" -Jeb

![F1BFC03E65FB781D5B4059CDB751A8E3C82053AA](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421878339825/F1BFC03E65FB781D5B4059CDB751A8E3C82053AA/)

"This wasn't in the mission briefing!" -Jeb after discovering how "smooth" the surface of Ovok was

![2644A600B098D3A912A9FEEB14FE054E3EC4E352](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421878338667/2644A600B098D3A912A9FEEB14FE054E3EC4E352/)

Sarn Set

![6B0CA4DBEFC3C7315AC355D873490B837F12331B](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421878340408/6B0CA4DBEFC3C7315AC355D873490B837F12331B/)

"Riding the Rings" Eeloo is visible in the background

![199F8928F5A957BF32728E5CE47CE9AE62BEFF95](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421878221785/199F8928F5A957BF32728E5CE47CE9AE62BEFF95/)

Jeb managed to find a flat landing spot between the spiky hills, but he realized Bill forgot to bolt on the landing gear!

![75169824000C792F49C2CB2EB8F6076E8E829B2C](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421878338848/75169824000C792F49C2CB2EB8F6076E8E829B2C/)

Luckily the low gravity means the lack of landing gear is not a big deal

![D12A5E3C6CA2847240757FB45F1BDB7671D1B678](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421878338977/D12A5E3C6CA2847240757FB45F1BDB7671D1B678/)

Looks like RCS fuel and nozzles were also forgotten, docking took about 5 attempts

![805F52160449A3621E9B45D76CAA2E82932EE33B](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421878340609/805F52160449A3621E9B45D76CAA2E82932EE33B/)

Approaching Hale

![435F707CD84AEDB79EB024514E408ADCB6F03D65](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421878374004/435F707CD84AEDB79EB024514E408ADCB6F03D65/)

Jeb decided that it would be easier to land the whole ship with the extremely low gravity, instead of going through another frustrating docking debacle

![3E2DAF34D874A599E71AC7E795FD9A619619513B](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421878577248/3E2DAF34D874A599E71AC7E795FD9A619619513B/)

Jeb calculated he had time for a couple pictures before the ship tipped over

![D3E7E1E4CE803F6D10D8B8B54283A8F210A38CA8](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421878577580/D3E7E1E4CE803F6D10D8B8B54283A8F210A38CA8/)

Jumping kilometers

![14C21FFD848B1AB1663EB65832DAA141D7557F0D](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/448455622251322858/14C21FFD848B1AB1663EB65832DAA141D7557F0D/)

Ascending from Hale

![44EC344033C6E8DAEA443227D3BEAEF183D3AEE5](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421878577989/44EC344033C6E8DAEA443227D3BEAEF183D3AEE5/)

Saying goodbye to Sarnus

![484295EDDE5085889856CC1B668A6539AE1EAAFF](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421878578244/484295EDDE5085889856CC1B668A6539AE1EAAFF/)

SarnEx prepares to gravity turn around the Kerbin for a Mun encounter

![E7B03E83CD4136E80B68E155019516A8A2A5BB25](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421878578377/E7B03E83CD4136E80B68E155019516A8A2A5BB25/)

Docking with MunSS for future refueling and reuse

![468E6EE84FFABFAE1EC2B1B30BB994F9C8467452](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421881493119/468E6EE84FFABFAE1EC2B1B30BB994F9C8467452/)

Good to be home

![448F8D8DFE9E699C9400777CBB91D59785F84249](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/455211421881475593/448F8D8DFE9E699C9400777CBB91D59785F84249/)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-10T15:32:16Z" title="07/10/2015 03:32  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 10, 2015</time> by nsgallup**

Very pretty scenery. Is this the Outer Planets mod or one of the others?

And how long did the trip take?
What visual mods do you use? I've been wanting a brighter Mun for ages.

> 
> Very pretty scenery. Is this the Outer Planets mod or one of the others?
> And how long did the trip take?

The planet, and moons (among others) are from OPM, the visuals are from astronomers visual pack using EVE.

Edit: It was an 11 year journey

> 
> The planet, and moons (among others) are from OPM, the visuals are from astronomers visual pack using EVE.
> Edit: It was an 11 year journey

I assume that's Astronomer's Interstellar pack (rather than Edge of Oblivion)?

Very pretty, and very awesome trip. SarnEx is a helluva rocket.

> 
> I assume that's Astronomer's Interstellar pack (rather than Edge of Oblivion)?
> Very pretty, and very awesome trip. SarnEx is a helluva rocket.

Indeed it is interstellar, just wait for UrlumEx!
